mapper.sql: RoleID, OpenID, Tel, UserName, Password, nickname, level, exp, score, Money, icon, beans, ingot, headurl, dest, RegTime, LoginTime
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from fm_user
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into fm_user (RoleID, OpenID, Tel, UserName, Password, nickname, level, exp, score, Money, icon, beans, ingot, headurl, dest, RegTime, LoginTime) values (#{roleid,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{openid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tel,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{exp,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{money,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{icon,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{beans,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{ingot,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{headurl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dest,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{logintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
